36/**
37 * \file
38 *
39 * This file contains a data type and functions to help estimate good
40 * round trip times for UDP resend timeout values.
41 */
42#include "config.h"
43#include "util/rtt.h"
44#include "iterator/iterator.h"
45
46/* overwritten by config: infra_cache_min_rtt: */
47int RTT_MIN_TIMEOUT = 50;
48/** calculate RTO from rtt information */
49static int
50calc_rto(const struct rtt_info* rtt)
51{
52 /* From Stevens, Unix Network Programming, Vol1, 3rd ed., p.598 */
53 int rto = rtt->srtt + 4*rtt->rttvar;
54 if(rto < RTT_MIN_TIMEOUT)
55 rto = RTT_MIN_TIMEOUT;
56 if(rto > RTT_MAX_TIMEOUT)
57 rto = RTT_MAX_TIMEOUT;
58 return rto;
59}
60
61void
62rtt_init(struct rtt_info* rtt)
63{
64 rtt->srtt = 0;
65 rtt->rttvar = UNKNOWN_SERVER_NICENESS/4;
66 rtt->rto = calc_rto(rtt);
67 /* default value from the book is 0 + 4*0.75 = 3 seconds */
68 /* first RTO is 0 + 4*0.094 = 0.376 seconds */
69}
70
71int
72rtt_timeout(const struct rtt_info* rtt)
73{
74 return rtt->rto;
75}
76
77int
78rtt_unclamped(const struct rtt_info* rtt)
79{
80 if(calc_rto(rtt) != rtt->rto) {
81 /* timeout fallback has happened */
82 return rtt->rto;
83 }
84 /* return unclamped value */
85 return rtt->srtt + 4*rtt->rttvar;
86}
87
88void
89rtt_update(struct rtt_info* rtt, int ms)
90{
91 int delta = ms - rtt->srtt;
92 rtt->srtt += delta / 8; /* g = 1/8 */
93 if(delta < 0)
94 delta = -delta; /* |delta| */
95 rtt->rttvar += (delta - rtt->rttvar) / 4; /* h = 1/4 */
96 rtt->rto = calc_rto(rtt);
97}
98
99void
100rtt_lost(struct rtt_info* rtt, int orig)
101{
102 /* exponential backoff */
103
104 /* if a query succeeded and put down the rto meanwhile, ignore this */
105 if(rtt->rto < orig)
106 return;
107
108 /* the original rto is doubled, not the current one to make sure
109 * that the values in the cache are not increased by lots of
110 * queries simultaneously as they time out at the same time */
111 orig *= 2;
112 if(rtt->rto <= orig) {
113 rtt->rto = orig;
114 if(rtt->rto > RTT_MAX_TIMEOUT)
115 rtt->rto = RTT_MAX_TIMEOUT;
116 }
117}
118
119int rtt_notimeout(const struct rtt_info* rtt)
120{
121 return calc_rto(rtt);
122}
